entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 11:11 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
